Public Records Keyword Search

Use keywords and phrases to search for:

• Council Meeting Records, including records of special called Council meetings and meetings of the Austin Housing Finance Corporation (AHFC), Tax Increment Financing (TIF) Boards, and Mueller Local Government Corporation (MLGC)

• Executed Ordinances And Resolutions

• Municipal Election Documents including Campaign Treasurer Appointments, Ballot Applications, and Financial Reports

  

Meeting Minutes Archives

Browse the Archives of City Council Meeting Minutes by year and meeting date from the late 19th century to the present
